entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:54 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:54 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
